buy-now-link-text:
With the link "buy it now" of <1>sicuro.com you can offer more guarantees to your customers who want to buy domains and at the same time have a quick and fast sales tool.

You can in fact create a link that contains pre-determined data, such as the domain name and the price you want to sell it to. By placing the link in your promotional emails or on the site where you promote your domains, you will offer the possibility to your buyers to buy your domain in an easy and immediate way.

The link will refer to a landing page provided by <1>sicuro.com in which the transaction data will be summarized and the purchase of the domain will be proposed.

The buyer who decides to purchase your domain name will simply have to fill in the data required to create the account (if he did not already have one) and confirm his willingness to buy it. In this way, the transaction will be immediately created and active!

Thanks to our technology, once the domain has been purchased and the transaction in progress, the link will be automatically deactivated, preventing third parties from buying the domain that is no longer available.

The use of our link "buy it now" is free, our fee will be applied only if the domain will be purchased.
